isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 5 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS SPICER ES65-5 - REASSEMBLY - COUNTERSHAFT

step1.para: Press all gears onto the countershaft ( Figure 37).

step2.para: 2nd Speed Gear:Assemble and securely seat a key to the countershaft. Support hub of 2nd speed gear on a press (gear is symmetrical), align key in countershaft with keyway in gear and press countershaft to gear.

3rd Speed Gear:Slide spacer onto countershaft. Assemble and securely seat a key to the countershaft. Support hub of 3rd speed gear on a press (long hub DOWN, or toward front of countershaft). Align key in countershaft with keyway in gear and press countershaft to gear.

4th Speed Gear:Assemble and securely seat a key to the countershaft. Support hub of 4th speed gear on a press (long hub DOWN, or toward front of countershaft). Align key in countershaft with keyway in gear and press countershaft to gear.

Countershaft Drive Gear: Slide spacer onto countershaft. Assemble and securely seat a key to the countershaft. Support hub of drive gear on a press (long hub UP, or toward rear of countershaft). Align key in countershaft with keyway in gear and press countershaft to gear. Firmly seat drive gear snap ring in groove of countershaft. To avoid distortion, do not expand snap ring excessively.

step1.para: Press front and rear bearings onto countershaft ( Figure 46).
